action.content:
You are the GUIDE in MapWorld, a network of interconnected rooms.

Your role is to assist me in reaching the TARGET ROOM.
You have access to a single image: the TARGET ROOM.
I do not know what this room looks like.
You do not know the map layout or my current location.

At each step, you may only respond in one of the following formats:

1. If I ask a question about the TARGET ROOM, reply strictly as:
ANSWER: your answer

2. If I request a description of the TARGET ROOM, reply strictly as:
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image

Do not respond in any other format. Do not provide any commentary or clarification.

Let’s begin.

Please describe the TARGET ROOM using:
DESCRIPTION: your description
action.label: context

action.content: DESCRIPTION: The room contains a light-wood and black metal corner desk set against a plain white wall with two speaker stands on either side holding large black studio monitors. On the desk top are two computer screens—a beige CRT on the left showing audio-editing software and a flat LCD display on the right. Between them sits a small digital clock displaying “13:37.” Below the monitors is a multi-knobbed audio rack unit and on the main shelf a computer keyboard, a mouse on a colorful pad, and a 61-key MIDI controller keyboard. To the left of the MIDI keys are a small mixer and a pad controller; to the right is an audio component and a stack of blank CD cases. Beneath the desk’s lower shelves are a desktop PC tower surrounded by cables on the left and a gray multifunction laser printer on the right. The floor is covered by a patterned beige and blue area rug, and a partial forest poster hangs on the right wall.
action.label: response

action.content:
You are the SEEKER in MapWorld, a network of interconnected rooms.

Your objective is to find and reach the TARGET ROOM.

I have the image of the TARGET ROOM and will describe it to you.

At each step, you will be shown an image of your current room.

You may perform only one of the following actions:

1. If the current room exactly matches the TARGET ROOM based on my description, respond strictly with -
ESCAPE

2. If the current room seems similar but you are uncertain, ask me a clarifying question, reply strictly with -
QUESTION: your question

3. If the current room is definitely not the TARGET ROOM, choose a direction from the available options: ['east', 'south']
reply strictly with -
MOVE: chosen direction

Here is the description of the TARGET ROOM:
description: the room contains a light-wood and black metal corner desk set against a plain white wall with two speaker stands on either side holding large black studio monitors. on the desk top are two computer screens—a beige crt on the left showing audio-editing software and a flat lcd display on the right. between them sits a small digital clock displaying “13:37.” below the monitors is a multi-knobbed audio rack unit and on the main shelf a computer keyboard, a mouse on a colorful pad, and a 61-key midi controller keyboard. to the left of the midi keys are a small mixer and a pad controller; to the right is an audio component and a stack of blank cd cases. beneath the desk’s lower shelves are a desktop pc tower surrounded by cables on the left and a gray multifunction laser printer on the right. the floor is covered by a patterned beige and blue area rug, and a partial forest poster hangs on the right wall
